sen.j: 洛陽田楽記（らくようでんがくき）は、大江匡房の著書。
sen.e: Rakuyo dengakuki is a book written by OE no Masafusa.
Rakuyo dengakuki is a book written by OE no Masafusa.
Rakuyo dengakuki is a book written by OE no Masafusa.

sen.j: 堀河天皇の1096年夏に京都で盛大に行われた田楽の記録で、漢文で書かれている。
sen.e: This is a record of dengaku (ritual music and dancing in shrines and temples) in Kyoto in 1096, in the era of Emperor Horikawa, which is written in kanbun (Chinese classics).
sen.cmt: 初出の場合のみDengaku (festival to pray for good harvest)とするChinese classics [英辞郎 on the web]
sen.e: This is a record of dengaku (ritual music and dancing in shrines and temples) in Kyoto in 1096, in the era of Emperor Horikawa, which is written in kanbun (Chinese classics).
This is a record of dengaku (ritual music and dancing in shrines and temples) in Kyoto in the summer of 1096, in the era of Emperor Horikawa, which is written in kanbun (Chinese classics).

sen.j: なお同年の記事は『古事談』の中にも記載がある。
sen.e: "Kojidan" (Talks of the Past) also contains article of the same year.
sen.cmt: 初出の場合のみKojidan (anthology of narrative literature)とする
sen.e: "Kojidan" (Talks of the Past) also contains articles of the same year.
